reviewText: The only cons here are the ones you will be learning from the DVDs. Super fast shipping - I had them in my hands in less than 72 hours after ordering.  Nice packaging.  High quality DVDs - both video and audio.  Fast paced with no filler.  Fun to watch and easy to learn.  A real deal.

With the information presented in this package it would be possible to earn a living, IF there was larceny in your heart. Mr. Robbins spills his guts for your education and edification. Even if you only use the stuff you learn to win a cuppa Starbucks or a beer you'll get your money's worth. I couldn't recommend this package enough..I'll bet you a five, you'll enjoy it too.

John
AKA Doc Jakson
